pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Undo translate, rotate, snap and align

content.raw: One challenge I can think of is determining what's a change "unit". Say you opened the editor and changed the pose and then the scale. What happens when you trigger undo? What happens when you reset the inspector? What if the user changed the pose by repeatedly pressing the increase button, should each of the presses be undone individually?
